# cortex Provider





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- **address** (String) Address of the Cortex cluster
- **api_key** (String, Sensitive) API key, used as basic auth password.
- **tenant** (String) Tenant ID, passed as X-Org-ScopeID HTTP header.
